chunk_text:
API Wishlist Survey

The Summer 2009 Revit API wishlist survey is now ready and will remain open until July 31st, 2009. Please take the time to fill out the survey. The engineering team uses the feedback you provide to prioritise our API development efforts. This is a great chance for you to have a direct impact on the direction we take in exposing APIs to our products. Kean Walmsley lists the wishlist surveys for other Autodesk products and offers to send you a copy of the results once theyÂ’ve been compiled if you (optionally) provide your email address in the survey. Thank you in advance for your feedback!
